typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as string,
		ShipDate as string,
		TotalCost as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Orders
source(output(
		OrderDetailID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as string,
		UnitCost as string,
		LineNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Orderdetail
Orders, Orderdetail join(Orders@OrderID == Orderdetail@OrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> SalesOrders
SalesOrders select(mapColumn(
		OrderID = Orders@OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		OrderDate,
		ShipDate,
		TotalCost,
		OrderDetailID,
		MovieID,
		Quantity,
		UnitCost,
		LineNumber
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SalesOrderConformed
SalesOrderConformed derive(SourceId = 1,
		UniqueOrderID = concat('1',OrderDetailID),
		UniqueMovieID = concat('1',MovieID),
		UniqueCustomerID = concat('1',CustomerID)) ~> SalesStaging
SalesStaging sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		OrderDate,
		ShipDate,
		TotalCost,
		OrderDetailID,
		MovieID,
		Quantity,
		UnitCost,
		LineNumber,
		SourceId,
		UniqueOrderID,
		UniqueMovieID,
		UniqueCustomerID
	)) ~> SalesOrderDetail

source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		StreamStart as date,
		StreamEnd as date,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SouthridgeStreaming
source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		RentalDate as string,
		ReturnDate as string,
		RentalCost as string,
		LateFee as string,
		RewindFlag as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> VanArsDelStreaming
source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		RentalDate as string,
		ReturnDate as string,
		RentalCost as string,
		LateFee as string,
		RewindFlag as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> FourthCoffeeStreaming
SouthridgeStreaming derive(SourceID = 1,
		UniqueOrderID = concat('1',TransactionID),
		UniqueMovieID = concat('1',MovieID),
		UniqueCustomerID = concat('1',CustomerID)) ~> NewColsAdded
NewColsAdded select(mapColumn(
		TransactionID,
		CustomerID,
		MovieID,
		StreamStart,
		StreamEnd,
		SourceID,
		UniqueOrderID,
		UniqueMovieID,
		UniqueCustomerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StreamingConformed
VanArsDelStreaming derive(SourceID = 2,
		UniqueOrderID = concat('2',TransactionID),
		UniqueMovieID = concat('2'+MovieID),
		UniqueCustomerID = concat('1',CustomerID),
		StreamStart = toDate(concat(left(RentalDate,4),'-',substring(RentalDate, 5, 2),'-',substring(RentalDate,7,2))),
		StreamEnd = toDate(concat(left(ReturnDate,4),'-',substring(ReturnDate, 5, 2),'-',substring(ReturnDate,7,2)))) ~> NewColsVAnArsdel
NewColsVAnArsdel select(mapColumn(
		TransactionID,
		CustomerID,
		MovieID,
		SourceID,
		UniqueOrderID,
		UniqueMovieID,
		UniqueCustomerID,
		StreamStart,
		StreamEnd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> VanArsDelConformed
FourthCoffeeStreaming derive(SourceID = 3,
		UniqueOrderID = concat('3',TransactionID),
		UniqueMovieID = concat('3',MovieID),
		UniqueCustomerID = concat('3',CustomerID),
		StreamStart = toDate(concat(left(RentalDate,4),'-',substring(RentalDate, 5, 2),'-',substring(RentalDate,7,2)))
,
		StreamEnd = toDate(concat(left(ReturnDate,4),'-',substring(ReturnDate, 5, 2),'-',substring(ReturnDate,7,2)))) ~> NewColsFourthCoffee
NewColsFourthCoffee select(mapColumn(
		TransactionID,
		CustomerID,
		MovieID,
		SourceID,
		UniqueOrderID,
		UniqueMovieID,
		UniqueCustomerID,
		StreamStart,
		StreamEnd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FourthCoffeeConformed
StreamingConformed, VanArsDelConformed, FourthCoffeeConformed union(byName: true)~> UnionAllConformed
UnionAllConformed sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Streaming
